statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT feedback_text, id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY feedback_text DESC
SELECT feedback_text AS feedback, sentiment_score AS score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.6 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, sentiment_category FROM customer_feedback JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_sentiment, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data JOIN sentiment_analysis ON feedback_data.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive'
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_data JOIN feedback_data ON customer_data.customer_id = feedback_data.customer_id ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT analysis_result, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_feedback.feedback_id = sentiment_analysis.feedback_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM customer_satisfaction ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT count(*) as total_count FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, category_name FROM feedback_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%Service%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_level FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, category_name FROM feedback_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT feedback_id, category_name FROM feedback_categories JOIN customer_feedback ON feedback_categories.feedback_id = customer_feedback.feedback_id WHERE category_name = 'Service';
